channel.title: Calendar on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Calendar on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: ISO 8601 date format and keeping track of weeks
item.description: Warning: objects in calendar are closer than they appear. I can never keep track of the day of the month, it seems. The watch on my wrist has a day marker, but it wants to have a 31 day month, and when we have 30 or 28 day months the day has to be manually adjusted. On the other hand, I have a keen sense for what day of the week it is.
